chart_description: The Apps Carried Over Uptime chart shows the uptime of containers and various system processes that are involved in carrying over the applications that run on the infrastructure.

dimension_descriptions.containers: The uptime of containers that are running the applications.
dimension_descriptions.go.d.plugin: The uptime of the Go.d plugin, which provides the monitoring metrics for netdata.
dimension_descriptions.kube-proxy: The uptime of the Kube-proxy, which manages network traffic in a Kubernetes cluster.
dimension_descriptions.kubelet: The uptime of the Kubelet, which ensures that containers are running and healthy on a Kubernetes node.
dimension_descriptions.netdata: The uptime of Netdata, which is a monitoring agent.
dimension_descriptions.other: The uptime of other processes that are involved in carrying the applications.
dimension_descriptions.system: The uptime of other system processes.
dimension_descriptions.tc-qos-helper: The uptime of the Traffic Control Quality of Service helper, which is used to implement QoS in Linux.
